actions.name: Actions
actions.description: Temporal Lock [Cast, Sight | Will] (Recharge Cd4): Paralyzed (Cd4) Multi-Attack: 2×Claw and 1×Bite (+1) Bite [Melee Attack]: 5 (d8+1) (+1) Claw [Melee Attack]: 8 (2d6+1)

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description: Maddening I: Enemies that can hear it for the first time and at the start of their Turns must pass [Will] or be Confused (Cd4). Terror I: Enemies that can see it for the first time and at the start of their Turns must pass [Will] or be Frightened (Cd4).
